title: Implementing Rate Limiting in Go
description: The lab demonstrates how to implement rate limiting in Go using goroutines, channels, and tickers.

meta.title: Go Programming | Rate Limiting | Goroutines | Channels | Tickers
meta.description: Learn how to implement rate limiting in Go using goroutines, channels, and tickers to control resource utilization and maintain quality of service.
meta.keywords: Go programming, rate limiting, goroutines, channels, tickers
